properties.entry: INSERT INTO State (CountryId, Name, Remarks, CreatedBy, CreatedOn, UpdatedBy, UpdatedOn) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE State SET CountryId = ?, Name = ?, Remarks = ?, UpdatedBy = ?, UpdatedOn = ? WHERE Id = ?
SELECT State.Id, State.CountryId, State.Name, State.Remarks, Country.Name AS CountryName FROM State LEFT OUTER JOIN Country ON Country.Id = State.CountryId WHERE State.Id = ?

SELECT State.Id, State.CountryId, State.Name, State.Remarks, Country.Name AS CountryName FROM State LEFT OUTER JOIN Country ON Country.Id = State.CountryId WHERE State.CountryId = ? ORDER BY State.Name ASC
SELECT State.Id, State.CountryId, State.Name, State.Remarks, Country.Name AS CountryName FROM State LEFT OUTER JOIN Country ON Country.Id = State.CountryId ORDER BY State.Id DESC
